Weapon.Name: Arcane Blade
Weapon.Description: A mystical sword once wielded by the kingdom's greatest warrior. It pulses with a spectral blue aura.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: presses the attack, stunning the enemy with his Arcane Blade. Arcane power surges, dealing additional damage.

Weapon.Name: Thunder Mace
Weapon.Description: A weighty mace with a head shaped like a thundercloud. Causes tremors and spews out electricity.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: unleashes a ground-breaking smash to their enemy, creating fear amongst the ranks.

Weapon.Name: Rubber Chicken
Weapon.Description: A seemingly innocuous rubber chicken. Perfect for fooling, but not much else.
Weapon.NarrativeLine: whacks the enemy with the rubber chicken, inducing confusion and hearty chuckle from the crowd.
